item.description: […] Now…you’ve actually seen this before…hidden under that orange jacket is the book I bound! Yup. That was for Beth all along. To make a book jacket, just cut a long strip of paper or card […]

item.title: By: Just ten more minutes… | fabrefaction
item.dc:creator: Just ten more minutes… | fabrefaction
item.description: […] re-pin your fabric layers together. You will see I used some of the adhesive fabric I used for my bookbinding tutorial. This was an error. The iron isn’t a huge fan of this material and vice versa. You will see […]

item.description: Hi there, I check your blog regularly. Your story-telling style is awesome, keep it up!

item.title: By: Katie

item.description: Thanks so much! It was my first try at book binding, it's so satisfying!
